title: Introduction to Python Tools
headline: Learn about the various Python Programming Tools, APIs, XML and JSON Structure in this free online course.
description: Python is a popular programming language with a simple syntax and a powerful set of libraries. This free online course discusses the various Python Programming Tools and Modules and Packages in detail, as well as Metaprogramming and JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). Discover how to interact with third-party APIs in an application, understand APIs, its importance, and how it can provide you with increased functionality in your program.

courseDescription:
This free online course on Python Tools explains Python as a language with a simple syntax, and a powerful set of libraries. Python is a general-purpose, versatile, and powerful programming language. It’s a great programming language because it’s concise and easy to read and everything from web development to machine learning and data science can be done with Python. If you have basic knowledge of Python, this Python course is a great next step because it discusses the Python Programming Tools, explains the Modules and Packages, Metaprogramming, and JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). You will understand the major Python Tools used for preparing the data for analysis, the tools available for understanding the data, using the data for insights and predictions. The content critically explains APIs, their importance, and how it can provide you with increased functionality in your program. 

You will be introduced to core programming concepts like data structures, conditionals, loops, variables, and functions. It also provides you with coding exercises/assessments where you will learn to design and write fully-functional Python programs using commonly used data structures, custom functions, and reading/writing to files. The content discusses the basics of Python 3, including conditional execution and iteration as control structures, and strings and lists as data structures. You will learn what iterators and generators are, discuss the regular expressions in Python 3, identify the concept of introspection and lambda functions.

Python has worldwide popularity for very good reason - it is quick and stable enough for a vast amount of uses and this Introduction to Python Tools course is for anyone who perhaps needs a refresher on Python tools or if you may have had some exposure to Python programming but want to learn some more detailed skills.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be taken through what Iterators and Generators are. You will learn the Concept of Introspection and Lambda Functions, and analyze the various Python Concepts. Also, you will learn about Metaclasses and Decorators.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be taken through Modules and Packages, knowing how to Leverage Third-Party Modules and Packages in Applications. Additionally, you will be taken through working with APIs, understanding API Integrations and the common ways APIs are used.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be taken through Implementing Algorithms, the Concept of Metaprogramming and Python 3 Implementations, Decorators and Monkey Patching, understanding how they work. You will also learn the overall structure of XML and JSON feeds, how to generate data in XML and JSON formats. Lastly, how to parse the types of data protocols in a Python program.
